key.name: $MyPCName$, I apologize for suddenly contacting you without prior notice.
The situation isn't good for me to ask how you have been. Everyone is going through hard times after the attack on Tria.

The farmland was trampled by the enemies, and the industrial facilities are on the verge of shutting down. The merchants stopped all business citing safety as the reason. We're short on food and supplies all over the place.
But $MyPCName$, wouldn't you do anything if only you can help the people and this situation?
There is something I would like to discuss... I mean, ask of you. Come to $map:02000153$. I'll be waiting.
We arrived just now as well.
Thank you for the trouble of coming here.
Since the most important person is here, shall we start?
Fine, let's start since we don't have time to waste.
Dark Wind, Green Hood, Secret Knight, and Tria Guard have been holding emergency countermeasure meetings all this time after the attack on Tria.
We had many meetings and discussed how to defend Maple World that is in crisis but...
Well... we don't have any bright idea. So we each decided to do what we do best. The Royal Guard helps people, Green Hood gathers and distributes supplies...
Uh, Allon. I'm not trying to be sarcastic, but what did the Secret Knight do?
If you're not being sarcastic... they did what they usually do. They observed the Shadow World and searched for traces of darkness. Although it turned out to be meaningless...
Well... the same goes for Dark Wind doing meaningless espionage.
One significant thing Dark Wind did was collecting every information on the traitor Katvan. We don't know when and how he will return.
And our search team succeeded in finding <font color="#ffd200">Katvan's secret data server</font> left in Dark Wind HQ.
But the thing that Katvan left was... <font size='40'>not simple data.</font>
<font size='40'><font color="#ffd200">Project Sky Fortress.</font> A construction plan for a next-generation mobility aircraft carrier.</font>
It's a large vessel with an independent operational capability converted for flight and to be used as Dark Wind's mobile center.
Katvan was concerned of HQ's safety after Black Mushroom and went with the plan for a mobile command facility that can maintain HQ functions even after a full-scale assault.
Well, it was just pretext for him to hide his conspiracy. The empress and Prime Minister Vidrem were clueless about this plan.
<font size='30'>It's obvious for whom Katvan was constructing Sky Fortress.</font>
Then... are we going to destroy this carrier?
<font size='40'>There's no way we would destroy something as nice as this.</font>
Dark Wind already secured the carrier and the construction facility. It even has a real corny codename called <font color="#ffd200">Dark Site Area 51</font>.
With Katvan gone, the engineers ran off and abandoned the facility. It was a piece of cake taking the place.
I thought this carrier is our chance. Maple World has always been attacked, but an opportunity has been given.
Dark Wind completely disassembled the carrier afterwards and newly constructed it as the carrier of the <font color="#ffd200">Maple Alliance</font>.
The allied factions of Dark Wind, Secret Knight, Green Hood, and Royal Guard. We decided to officially call it the <font color="#ffd200">Maple Alliance</font>.
And this carrier... we're going to make Sky Fortress the flagship of the Maple Alliance.
We can go quickly and safely to wherever that needs help, and we can transport supplies without fear of getting them stolen by enemies or monsters.
It truly is a sky fortress, the shield of the skies. It is our last hope in defending Maple World.
This is <font color="#ffd200">'that plan'</font> I talked about earlier. The newly formed Project Sky Fortress.
It looks to be equipped with all the necessary elements such as military strength, a base, and operational plan. But it's missing the most important thing.
Hehe... the most important element is...
Empress Ereve made one request when we reported the establishment of the Maple Alliance and the Sky Fortress plan.
$MyPCName$, you are the center of the Maple Alliance. We want you to assume the reins.
You thought what they were saying was strange at first but soon understood.
Me, Blackeye, Oska, and Frey. Each of our troops and our individual skills may be outstanding.
But we have a low understanding of each other's faction. That is a big obstacle in the alliance's plan.
But you, $MyPCName$, are different. You went on adventures with all of the factions and experienced them all.
The empress had her eyes on that point. She saw potential in you to be the center of each faction.
$MyPCName$, I'm sorry to have called you all of sudden to make this request, but it's time to get down to business.
<font size='40'>I want to select you as the Maple Alliance's vanguard.</font>
I will give you some time to think it over. Talk to me once you have decided.
I will give you some time to think it over. Talk to me once you have decided.
Hm, you decided quicker than I thought.
I see... you were already determined and didn't need to think about it. It looks like the empress didn't recommend you for no reason.
Fine, $MyPCName$. From this day forward, I include you in the Maple Alliance's vanguard and as the alliance guardian.
Now we can finally do something. I leave it to you, $MyPCName$.
To the Maple Alliance's new base, the Sky Fortress, of course.
It's going to take off soon. That's why we had to hurry.
(...You say to him to tell you important things like these in advance.)
Haha, I'm sorry. I had no choice since I need to keep it confidential.
Now, stop crying and let's go! <font color="#ffd200">Dark Site Area 51</font> is quite far from here.
(Ask where Dark Site Area 51 is located.)
Hehe... You'll be surprised. A secret weapon is sometimes right under your feet.
Hehe... You'll be surprised. A secret weapon is sometimes right under your feet.
This is truly the work of Dark Wind to convert Revoldic Dam like this.
It's very close to Tria and Katvan made this...
Be at ease. This place is unrelated to Katvan now.
Let's introduce ourselves first since there are new faces.
Hm! Does that mean Briche is the captain of Sky Fortress?
...That brusqueness is just like your father...
Anyways, pleased to work with you Captain Briche. This person here was recommended by the empress.
Let's leave the introductions for later since we're busy for takeoff.
The adjutant should be waiting at the front of the carrier. The leaders should be briefed and leave quickly if possible.
<font size='35'>The operation will be carried out by your <font color="#ffd200">successors</font>.</font>
...Hmph, acting just like Admiral Martini's daughter.
...Hm? Didn't I say we're busy? Hurry to the adjutant and get briefed on the mission. That's all.
Hello leaders and $MyPCName$! I'm Nairin, the tactical adjutant!
$MyPCName$, I heard you're taking the central role in this operation. I look forward to working with you!
Anyways, I really missed you Oska!
Whispering... (Nairin, focus! You're the representing the Green Hoods right now!)
Now I'll begin the briefing on the Maple Alliance's defense operation and aircraft carrier Sky Fortress!
<font size='35'>HMS-001, the living island-class aircraft mobility carrier Sky Fortress.</font>
This carrier was built under the guidance of Dark Wind's previous leader Katvan-
Uh... adjutant? I already relayed the information on Katvan and this carrier has nothing to do with him now.
Uh... yes, that is true but...
Uh... Alright! Now I'll explain the Maple Alliance task force mission-
Each faction is closely aligned with $MyPCName$ at the center taking an active part. We go around Maple World removing threats and promoting safety.
Hey! You should leave some for our adjutant!
Well... looks like everyone already knows... I'll just...
Ah, Adjutant Nairin. I have a question.
<font size='35'>I'm curious of the weapons and system equipped on Sky Fortress. Can't we be briefed on that?</font>

Front guns, tail guns, ground strike weapon, anti-aircraft weapon, armored carrier, plate unit, engine output, cruising speed, flight distance, deck planes, crewmembers, mounted personnel, carrier facilities, early warning system, radar system, and so forth!
Uh... Nairin? I don't think we need the details for that...
Hehe, I think this is going to take long. $MyPCName$, why don't you meet the officers from the other units in the meantime?
All of them were recommended by the leaders of each faction and assigned to Sky Fortress just like Adjutant Nairin.
Since everyone's new, it would be great to make an introduction before taking off.
Hey there, $MyPCName$. Good to see you! I'm Schatten, officer of Dark Wind.
Hey there, $MyPCName$. Good to see you! I'm Schatten, officer of Dark Wind.
Hey there, $MyPCName$. Good to see you! I'm Schatten, officer of Dark Wind.
Seeing you up close, you're the cute type. I feel like you were taller during the <font color="#ffd200">Black Mushroom incident</font>. Maybe it's because of that robot!
(You saw me back then in Kerning City?)
Hey, of course! I even saw you in <font color="#ffd200">Lith Harbor</font>. Weren't you aware?
You should keep your eyes peeled. Hahaha!
You see, I know everything about you. I used to a part of <font color="#ffd200">Shadow Wind</font>.
There are so many things I don't want to know about, but my eyes and ears are all over Maple World.
(<font color="#ffd200">Shadow Wind</font>...? Ask what that is.)
<font size='40'>I'll have to shoot you if I tell you... Do you still want to know?</font>
Ahahaha! I'm joking! It's a joke! I wanted to see your awkward expression and it was really cute.
I'll tell you about Shadow Wind once we get a bit closer. Unfortunately, I can't trust right now.

Anyways, Dark Wind will now go all over Maple World to <font color="#ffd200">bust crime</font>, <font color="#ffd200">work undercover</font>, and search for <font color="#ffd200">Katvan's remaining members</font> from Sky Fortress.
$MyPCName$, I look forward to working with you and try to make me like you.
Oh, go around that corner and you'll find Condor, the Tria Guard's Royal Guard Leader. You are going around meeting the officers, right?
You should have met him first and not me... haha! I pray that you are lucky and have social sense!
Are you the one who pulled strings and joined the unit by recommendation from the empress?!
Are you the one who pulled strings and joined the unit by recommendation from the empress?!
<font size='35'>Are you the one who pulled strings and joined the unit by recommendation from the empress?!</font>
Ha! What nonsense! During my time, we never dreamt of joining a mission through recommendations! You need to contest with skills. Kids these days... tsk tsk.
(...Ask whether he's Condor the Royal Guard Leader.)

(Ah... I thought you were the Royal Guard Leader because of your confident and brawny appearance. If you're not, I want to make a request to Tria Guard to take you in and make you one of the officers.)
You have good eyes unlike other young people these days!
That's right! I'm Condor the Royal Guard Leader. I'm the officer of Tria Guard for the Maple Alliance.
Not many years passed since I passed on the position of Guard Captain to Frey, but all of these incidents broke out as soon as I left that position!
And that Frey was going around saying he's going to join the Maple Alliance after the attack on Tria, so I said something to him.
Hey! How can the Guard Captain leave Tria and the empress! I didn't dare think about that during my time!
That won't do. That is why I, Condor, joined as the officer of Tria Guard instead of Frey.
(That's the Royal Guard Leader for you... Nice shot.)
<font size='35'>Trying to join me already! Ahahahaha!</font>
Well, if you want to join me and succeed, you should be fully aware of the mission objectives that Tria Guard will carry out.
My Guard is in charge of <font color="#ffd200">closely defending every place around the world</font>, not just Tria, and <font color="#ffd200">providing supplies when they are low</font>.
If you know <font color="#ffd200">various Life Skills</font>, you will be a greater help than expected.
I'll decide whether you get to join me depending on your actions! I'll keep an eye on you when the mission begins!
If you're meeting the other officers, a young person like you is just gawking around the carrier by the bridge. Go over there. He's the officer of the Secret Knight.
Wearing his coat on his shoulders... What a show off! If the rules of the Guard attire gets applied, I would be blasting on him!
Sky Fortress... it truly is a huge carrier.
Sky Fortress... it truly is a huge carrier.
Sky Fortress... it's beyond my expectation. To be able to build something like this with human power.
But it's compact in size when compared to my Knight HQ, <font color="#ffd200">Eye of Providence</font>, since it was made by the goddess of light...
(Ask if he's the officer of the Secret Knight.)
Secret Knight... That's what we were called.
Let me make a formal introduction. I'm Mason the temple knight, officer of the <font color="#ffd200">Lumiknights</font>.
That's the official name of the Secret Knight. Since the Q-class confidentiality has been lifted, I have decided to reveal the Secret Knight by its official name, the Lumiknights.
The Lumiknights have been hiding behind the shadow of mysticism and observing the world without getting involved.
Just like in the past during the War of Light and Darkness...
But now it's going to be different. I support the decision of the higher ups in trying to clear their faults.
The Lumiknights will work with the Alliance to <font color="#ffd200">investigate the Shadow World</font> and <font color="#ffd200">defend against the energy of darkness</font> all over Maple World.
Anyways, I look forward to working with you when the mission begins.
Pass this place and go down the passage. I'll take my leave...
Hm? Do you have business with me?
Hm? Do you have business with me?
Hm? Do you have business with me?
(I-I came to finish the introduction from earlier...)
Hm, I didn't know that bothered you.
Welcome, $MyPCName$. I'm Captain Briche Martini of the Tria Navy.
...?! (She was suddenly nice... What's going on? Wasn't she a scary person?)
(Uh... I'm confused. I didn't expect that response from her?!)

<font color="#ffd200">I met with the officers of each faction and talked about their mission. I'm also curious about the Maple Alliance.</font> That is written all over your face, but maybe I'm wrong.
(No! No! No! You say that she's right.)
Hm. It seems you're nervous since we have a big mission ahead of us.
The Maple Alliance is a union of each faction, but will also take on independent missions separate from them.
Probably most will be the <font color="#ffd200">captain's direct order</font>. Special missions outside the jurisdiction of the other factions.

They will be either <font color="#ffd200">searching danger areas</font> all over Maple World, <font color="#ffd200">testing experimental weapons</font> of the carrier, or sometimes <font color="#ffd200">entering dungeons</font>.
<font size='35'>That is, only when you are qualified to take on those missions.</font>
Don't think that I accepted you just because you were recommended by the empress. I don't want anyone I haven't accepted on this fleet.
We will start immediately with the mission assessment process when Sky Fortress takes off.
You will be <font color="#ffd200">tested on whether you are qualified to take on the mission</font> of each faction.
Hm, I shouldn't have said that when you're already nervous.
That's good to hear. Let's end our talk here. Take action after getting the status on the takeoff preparation from Adjutant Nairin. That's all.
...Last of all, the Green Hoods will temporarily put aside the main combat missions, and proceed with support missions for the other factions and the Maple Alliance.
...Last of all, the Green Hoods will temporarily put aside the main combat missions, and proceed with support missions for the other factions and the Maple Alliance.
...Last of all, the Green Hoods will temporarily put aside the main combat missions, and proceed with <font color="#ffd200">support missions for the other factions and the Maple Alliance</font>.
Then the Green Hoods must be in charge of the <font color="#ffd200">MAVIEW Radar System</font> that you mentioned earlier!
Frey... I didn't know he was a military buff...
Maybe that's why he became a soldier...
Sky Fortress's MAVIEW Radar System is also linked to my data tablet. Would you like to see the test run we're doing right now?
Oh, what great timing! The radar caught something.
These <font color="#ffd200">red dots</font> are the radar response. Biological responses not of our allies are <font color="#ffd200">red</font>...
<font size='40'>Why are there red dots there?!</font>
The first assessment mission is to <font color="#ffd200">subdue the monsters near Lava Crest</font>.
That area is a highly strategic place as Pyrros Fard's isolation area. It will be difficult if the monsters cause a disturbance and the isolation gets relaxed.
It's fitting as an assessment mission, right? But you need to be careful because it's actually the real thing.
Your first assessment mission is to subdue the monsters near Lava Crest.
Let's see... the monster response dropped below the danger level! Mission complete, $MyPCName$.
Oh! When you complete a mission, you can check the <font color="#ffd200">each faction's status from the Adventure menu</font>.
From this status, you can see <font color="#ffd200">comments from other members</font> regarding your activities. You should check it out often!
Hey, $MyPCName$! You should come over here now. Nainai, are you trying to keep $MyPCName$ to yourself?
What are you talking about? And I'm not Nainai?! Call me Nairin!
Now, $MyPCName$. Actually, there's something I want to confirm with you as well.
A signal from a monster that has been giving us trouble was detected right next to the area where you just had your mission.
It's an adverse condition enforcement reconnaissance drone developed by MSL Robot Dev Center a long time ago. For some unknown reason, it went out of control and started attacking adventurers.
I don't know what was on their mind when they made that... I think those guys from MSL intentionally released the Prizbox series in a remote area to test combat robots.
I want to arrest all of them and feed them Coro Mushroom Soup... but I don't have any evidence.
Well, I'll give this mission to you and also see your ability in impromptu field missions.
<font size='35'>You can find that out yourself!</font>
Find the area on the World Map and do the mission.
Yoo-hoo! You did pretty well! Shall I give you a kiss on the cheeks for successfully completing your first field mission?
Haha! You can't save them up, so there's no use if you regret it!
What you just did was a field mission. It was doable, right?
When the mission officially begins, check out the <font color="#ffd200">areas on the World Map every day for that day's field mission</font>.
Your judgment on taking part in the field missions or not is important. It's fine to <font color="#ffd200">leave the area if it's hard for you to carry it out</font>.
<font color="#ffd200">The mission in progress will remain even though you leave the area</font>, but remember to finish before <font color="#ffd200">midnight because it will be aborted</font>.
<font size='35'>Nairin, what is going on right now?</font>
<font size='35'>Unidentified biological responses have been detected from all sides... They are approaching fast!</font>
I have a rough idea of what's going on... I've seen beings approaching at this speed just once.
...M-mason! Refrain from such talk in this situation!
You won't say that if you actually saw them... hm.
<font size='35'>Oh...! An image is being transmitted from the observation scanner!</font>
<font size='35'>The Rooks? They must have obtained information from Katvan...</font>
Captain! There's too many of them! We can't defeat them with our current troops!
I'm sure their objective is hijacking Sky Fortress. Then there's no need for us to try and clear them out.
<font size='35'>Let's move to where they can't reach us.</font>
<font size='35'>To all members, prepare for emergency takeoff!</font>
Nairin, what's the status on the carrier?
<font size='35'>Reactor is 60% charged! We need more time, captain!</font>
I'll make you as much time as you need.
Nairin, we didn't become leaders because we're cool.
Adjutant, don't worry because we also have $MyPCName$ with us. I'll come back later for the briefing.
$MyPCName$, everyone is talking with confidence but this won't be an easy battle.
However... we must protect the carrier for our comrades that fell at the Tria Battlefield.
Joddy would want that as well.
To all members! Protect the carrier until we're ready for takeoff!
Was that the last transport? I guess everyone's safe.
(What happened? I'm sure the guns were fired...)
...I was on the carrier when I opened my eyes. Even I'm dumbfounded on what happened.
We somehow survived... Was it because of <font color="#ffd200">Bulwark</font> blocking the explosion?
That shield was definitely useful, but no one would have been safe if the guns were real.
It was an XR-class prototype. A nonlethal thermobaric weapon.
The explosive used on the enemies was just flashy in appearance. It was a <font color="#ffd200">weapon with little destructive power used as a show of force</font>.
Oh...! It's the explosive that Adjutant Nairin talked about! It creates a large-scale shockwave with just atmospheric and blasting pressure...
Yes! It's that weapon! In other words, it's just a frightening fireworks!
Nairin... do you want to experience it too? If you shoot fireworks at people, does it hurt or not?
It would hurt a lot if you were ordinary people, but it would just sting a little for knights at the temple knight level.
...Well, when I think about how they fled scared out of their wits, the plan wasn't so bad.
$MyPCName$, your performance was remarkable. You calmly went into battle against such numbers.
Good job. You should rest since you must be exhausted.
Of course. This is when we should be fully prepared or we will be in danger.
I would like the leaders to return to Tria and report the situation to the empress.
<font size='35'>The carrier is safe, but Maple World is in more danger than before.</font>
That is correct... the enemies are even more daring after the attack on Tria. Everyone, let's hurry.
$MyPCName$, it's a pity but you don't have time for rest.
When the carrier is on a stable trajectory, your assessment mission will be executed as planned.
Don't think that I'll pull punches because this happened.
We're going to thoroughly assess you at this rate. I think Maple World's danger level went up a few just now. That means we need a competent member.
$MyPCName$, it will be a good way for you to grow by getting recognition from Captain Briche and the other members. Make sure to become an essential member of the fleet.
Hm, I never knew I would say this to someone other than Lennon, but let me say it.
I don't really say this, but I feel like that youngster will give you wrong information!
Why, look at this! An elder is speaking and you're making irrelevant remarks... tsk tsk...
What I'm trying to say is that I will be talking about the Faction Shop instead of him.
Below the bridge, the <font color="#ffd200">quartermaster sells basic supplies</font>, but each <font color="#ffd200">faction officer sells special items</font>!
<font size='35'>But the Faction Shop has a use restriction.</font>
The reason is simple, so listen up. There was an order from Captain Briche to <font color="#ffd200">grant permission to use the shop only to those whose ability has been vetted</font>.
And rules were created for these special items to be <font color="#ffd200">purchased with a special currency called Faction Token</font> in order to prevent reckless use of those items.
I completely agree with the captain's decision! If Tria Guard's latest equipment is given to a rookie like you, anybody and everybody will take the Tria Guard lightly!
Well... if you want to join me, seize an opportunity, and become a hero, you might especially get the Tria Guard's latest equipment. Ahahahaha!
Well... if you want to join me, seize an opportunity, and become a hero, you might especially get the Tria Guard's latest equipment. Ahahahaha!
Well, you can check out the Faction Shop later if you're curious about anything else. I've been watching and the other factions brought in new equipment and items.
Tactical adjutant! If the Green Hoods have any extras, why don't you trade with us, the Tria Guard?
I really want to help since we're in the Alliance... I don't know why but I don't want to give them to you...
$MyPCName$, I received a report on the assessment process.
I'll tell you the result right now.
You are capable to be deployed to the field immediately, but the officers want to continue watching you.
Therefore, I will be watching you coldly for the time being.
$MyPCName$, you should be aware by now. We don't assess people based on rumors and the mood.
Even if you're recommended by Empress Ereve, you need to be newly assessed by me and the fleet members.
This fair assessment will lead to your growth, and that growth might become the first step of a hero to protect Maple World.
If you're curious about that, then start testing your potential now.
If you want to know where you are, open the World Map and see!
I'm a little sorry to suddenly push this on to you!
If you want to know where you are, open the World Map and see!
The drone's signal weakened a lot. $MyPCName$, I think that's enough!
Now I'm going to analyze the weakness of the Prizbox series with your combat data. Then dispatching the Dark Wind members for the rest will be enough.
Good job, you should return now!
For the captain to gather all of us, this doesn't feel good. Right, $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$?
Well, maybe she's going to make a public confession to you seeing how she's gathered everyone.
I like Nairin. I really like Nairin. I very much like Nairin.
Hehe! If the captain doesn't say it, I will! You know I like you Nainai, right?
Stop teasing me if you really like me!
<font size='40'>I will now give the fleet's top priority mission.</font>
As you all know, air supremacy in Maple World has come back to us with the appearance of Sky Fortress.
Now the merchants have resumed the <font color="#ffd200">flying trading ship</font> that was Maple World's past pride.
Haha! That's good news! Now supplies and food will flourish.
$MyPCName$, you don't know about the flying trading ship? I think you need some special private lessons for not knowing Maple World's specialty.

This beautiful carrier, also known as the <font color="#ffd200">flying trading ship</font>, was one of Maple World's pride! Not just the supplies transport one, but the passenger type was real famous too!
They were put of my commission when we lost the skies in the past war, but I'm really glad that they have returned.
The shield of the skies restored benefits and memories. That makes it worthwhile to get involved in the world.
...But you didn't gather us just for this good news, right? Captain, please get to the point now.
It's a shame that I don't have only good news.
As Mason said, I didn't gather you just for good news.
We received information that 4 flying trading ships went missing. And one of them was discovered destroyed.
Wasn't the skies our domain now? Even the airborne early warning system was functioning properly.
Strictly speaking, the territory of the skies that our fleet can cover is extremely limited...
If the filter is based on something not in our database, it's highly likely that it won't get detected by the warning system.

Looks like the aftermath of the emergency takeoff is slowly reaching us. Both the airborne early warning system and the weapon system are not in a perfect state... We will need to be fully equpped if we're going to consider a prolonged battle.
But we can't sit on our hands. In order to protect the flying trading ships, we must reveal the cause of the crash and find the missing ones.
Now, make use of each faction's specialty and commence the search operation.
Tria Guard will collect information from Tria and the nearby cities on the missing trading ships. Try to get information from many people as possible.
Dark Wind will secure trade routes of all the flying trading ships that went active recently. It won't be easy, but you can use any means necessary.
For real? Really, captain? It's been a while but I'm going to use the Shadow Wind style, okay?
When I said any means necessary, limit them to Dark Wind tactics.
Aww! I got excited for no reason!
Green Hood will get information from our collaborator in the Barrota Trading Company and analyze that information.
Lumiknights will move to the trading ship crash site. Go investigate your domain.
To sum up... you must mean the dark energy. I wasn't really happy about that place either.
Heh... you have good senses, captain.
You will make use of your unique mobility to head each faction's field mission.
It will be a fitting mission as the Alliance Guardian.
Make use of your unique mobility to help everyone.
While each faction proceeds with the investigation, I will be restoring the data on the black box retrieved from the crashed trading ship with the fleet's analysis team.
However... it was severely damaged and proper restoration doesn't seem likely. Therefore, the investigation results from each faction will become the most important clue.
Hey, rookie! Any thoughts on becoming the Royal Guard's chess piece?
(Say that you're on standby for mission as Condor Special Forces.)
Bwahahaha! Looks like you're completely under me!
Fine! Like the captain said, let's collect information on the flying trading ships from people.
We'll start with <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000062$</font> first! It should be the harbor first since it's a trading ship, right? You know the movie, Lith the Harbor?
(Oh! Say that movie was really fun, even though you haven't watched it.)
...Huh? I didn't really like that movie...
(Say that actually it was really bad.)
Right? Even our movie taste is the same. You really are under me.
While you gather information at the harbor, I'll need to ask the Royal Guards something.
Tria is vast. I will need to single out the people I know.
...What are you doing? Move it! Condor Special Forces! Bwahahahaha!
What are you doing? Hurry up!
You're too slow! How could someone young as you return later than me!
So, did you ask the residents? Did they know something?
(There are rumors that everything disappears when a ship with wings moves in the skies.)
Hm... that must mean the residents saw those 4 ships. But since the same number didn't return, such an unsettling rumor is going around.
Now, let's go to Tria that I bisque fired to finish our investigation.

According to my source, there's an unsettling rumor going around <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000001$</font>. We should figure out what the rumor is about since it might be connected to the missing trading ships.
Source? Well... my source is vast you could call it a fortress! Bwahahaha!
<font color="#909090">(...Oh god of society... may your power...)</font>
(Slap your knees and act like you can't breathe from laughing so hard.)
I can't believe you're getting excited with a joke like that. If I tell a real joke, you'll get pinned by a metal tombstone. Hahaha!
Since I'm feeling good, I'll give you some money for the Air Taxi. Go there quickly by taxi!
What are you doing? Aren't you going to find out the rumor?
So, what was the unsettling rumor going around amongst the residents of Tria?
(Hand the photo you received from Denver.)
Hm? It's blurry and I can't tell what it is... Looks like a black bird with a long neck.
Do you have presbyopia? It could look like that if you're looking at it upside down.
You youngster! The photo isn't clear to begin with! I know there's something but I can't tell what it is!
But there's one thing I suspect just looking at that silhouette. Hm... but if my suspicion is right... this is scary.
Argh... you come here and make me upset. Anyways, something serious is happening.
Hm... the royal court must definitely know something when even ordinary people saw and felt many things. It's strange that they are silent...
Hey, Condor Special Forces. I have a last mission for you. Ask the Tria royal court about this rumor.
The royal court handles much more information than ordinary people. They must already be aware of the unsettling rumor and the truth behind it.
(Say that Condor Special Forces will depart immediately.)
Hey, why are you in a hurry? Get on the Air Taxi and take it slow. And do some shopping while you're in Tria.
Why are you messing around when I sent you off nicely?
Surely you must have brought back useful information, right?
(Relay the information you heard from everyone.)
A being even the goddess of light couldn't kill? Aren't we in trouble then?
(Say that being doesn't exist in Maple World anymore.)
That's a relief. But did $npcName:11003566[gender:0]$ say <font color="#ffd200">previous captain</font>?
Don't tell me <font color="#ffd200">that</font> reappeared. There's no way...
This is making me feel uncomfortable... People are saying demons are flying in the skies or some great threat is approaching...
Good job, rookie. Relay this information to the captain for now.
Come over here, cutie! You just heard what the captain said, right?
Our job is to figure out the trade route of the flying trading ship. Then we can find out where they were headed and which fleet disappeared.
(Ask if a request can be made to the merchants to help with information.)
Tell me about it. That's how it should be... The other merchants are fine, but the Barrota Trading Company is scared and coming out passive.
It's not like they just started the business. They don't want to hand over the trade route because it will reveal the places where they make money.

I understand but they should have cooperated since the scale of this matter is different. They're just thinking about profits when a ship and people went missing. Tell them to be ready for an investigation when this matter is resolved.
Well, that will be taken care of by Dark Wind later. There's something you and I have to do.
No matter how much they want to hide it, all the trade route and data are stored in the MSL cloud.
We are going to hack into the MSL communication device and snatch the data.
Unfortunately, that communication device is a closed network. In other words, you need to go to the site directly and access the communication device.
Don't worry! Just connect the Dark Wind USB to the device and I'll take care of the rest. Then I leave it to you!
You didn't forget my request, did you? Should you be here right now?
Good job! The key to the closed network is accessing the device. It's a piece of cake once we have access.
But... what do we do about this?
The area we just accessed doesn't have even half of the data! I'm sure they used distributed storage.
But they're better than I expected. Very little can be gleaned even though information slips through one location if data is managed like this.
Hm, let's go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000162$</font> next. There's a machine there that processes many data. We should check the data there.
You will need to use some force this time. If $npcName:21000134$ is there, we can't hack from here due to the jamming signals. That's really annoying, don't you agree?
I'll give you a massage when you come back! Good luck.
Didn't you get the data yet? Then your massage will come later!
Ugh, we can't fully analyze the data yet even though we added the one you got this time! They're really annoying me.
The encouraging thing is that we gathered half the data!
If we make a deduction based on the data we got so far...hm, they have at least 5 trade routes. Seeing how some departure and arrival have a fixed route, it looks like there are safe routes.
We're almost done. Keep it up a little more, cutie.
It's time to hack again! Let's see where our little kitten is going this time.
(...Say that you want to act freely now.)
Oh, no! If you, little kitten, act as you please, you will get caught by the captain.
She will ask where you're going and not doing the mission you're told to do.
Captain, do you have a radar that responds to kitten? How did you appear at just the right time?
I was really surprised and almost forgot to give our kitten an errand.
$MyPCName$, move out! Go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000277$</font> and access the device!
$MyPCName$, I'm not going to pet you even if you wait here. Hurry along on your errand.
Argh... How much of the data did they split?
If I did this according to the Shadow Wind style, I would have already gotten the trade route by now and even found out who their kindergarten crush was.
<font color="#909090">(Shadow Wind... I wonder what sort of organization it was?)</font>
Just a little more! Looking at the data we got so far, we just need to secure data from one more location!
Now let's move out for the finale.
The last place you need to go is <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000269$</font>. Once you get the final data from that place, we'll be able to figure out the trade route of the flying trading ship.
Are you motivated because this is the last? But I want to spend more time with you!
Didn't you say that you'll bring me what I want? Or are you next to me because you want to play with me? I want to play with you too, but there are too many eyes here.
Phew... the flying trading ship's trade route is finally complete.
I should acknowledge their efforts. It's my first time seeing data managed like this. The new president of the Barrota Trading Company is no ordinary person.
You went through a lot. I'll give your reward on your cheek, okay?
Hm? Why are you suddenly blushing?
Hahah. Why are you running away? Thanks for the trouble!
$MyPCName$, let's do our best this time!
What we need to do is get the ledger from our collaborator in the Barrota Trading Company.
If the trading ship crashed because of an attack from someone, they must have been after the goods loaded on the ship.
We need the trading book to prove that hypothesis.
We decided to meet the collaborator in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000139$</font>. I will proceed with optical reconnaissance of the area just in case.
Oh! You'll have an easy time to the operation area as a deck plane has been arranged!
Vanguard Six, relaying from the bridge. Landing zone is <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000139$</font>. $MyPCName$ will get on board.
$MyPCName$, what are you doing here right now? Did you forget to bring the ledger?
Aren't you $MyPCName$? What brings you here?
(Say that you came as Maple Alliance's representative.)
So you're the person that was going to be sent by the Green Hoods! If it's you, then I can be reassured.

Sigh... the Barrota Trading Company got a new president after what happened to <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000526[gender:0]$</font>. Everyone was happy at first since that position has been vacant for a long time.
But everything about the new president is a mystery. I've never seen the president or even know the president's name. But another thing I can't stand is that even the ledger is full of secrets.

Many funds are circulating in our trading company due to the recent supply and demand of munition. It wouldn't be wrong to say that it's currently the core of our company. But the ledger for this munition is all written by hand.
(Ask if another record is being kept.)
Only the president has access to the munition ledger. I secretly took the ledger because I believe such transactions will ruin our company someday, but there's magic on this and I can't read it.
I was worried whether I'd find someone trustworthy if I requested for help, but I can be at ease if it's you, $MyPCName$. Please find someone who can decipher the magic on this ledger.
(Ask if it's dangerous because the ledger was taken in secret.)
It's fine. I didn't take it directly from the president's office but intercepted it. I won't be suspected even though it's found out that the ledger is gone.
(Tell him to be careful because he might never know.)
Thanks for the concern. Then I place my trust in you!
That must be the secret ledger! The cover won't move because of the magic.
We need the wisdom of a high ranking wizard in order to decipher the magic on this secret ledger. $MyPCName$, is there anyone you know?
(Say that you think it might be possible with <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000033[gender:0]$</font> of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000023$</font>.)
It's a good thing that you know someone! Or I would had to analyze places where high ranking wizards usually stay. This will save some time!
<font color="#909090">(How can you get that from an analysis?!)</font>
Thank you $MyPCName$. Then I'll provide support to send you there right now.
What's the magic deciphering status? We're in a tricky situation because the Guard Leader is saying to open it by force!
(Say that you came for a request.)
Well, this is new. I was the one who always came with requests. Tell me what it is. I'll listen to it if I can help.
(Show him the secret ledger and ask if it can be deciphered.)
Where did you get this? I can sense an extremely complicated magical modification.
(Say that you can't tell him the source.)
Oh, it was simply an intellectual curiosity. $MyPCName$, I'm sorry to say this but deciphering protection magic is not my specialty.
However, I know a protection magic expert.
It's the <font color="#ffd200">Ellinel class president</font>... Hehe.
You're lucky, $MyPCName$. It just so happens that the <font color="#ffd200">Ellinel class president</font> is here in this place.
I believe she would easily decipher magic like this.
She's often in front of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000109$</font>. She says she focuses the best there. You should go there.
She should be in front of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000109$</font>. Hurry over there.
Well, if it isn't $MyPCName$. What brings you here?
(Say that you came to meet the Ellinel class president.)
Ellinel class president...? Good thing you're here!
So, what do you want to ask the Ellinel class president?
I don't help just anyone, but I'll especially help you since we're not strangers.
(Hand her the secret ledger and ask her to decipher the protection magic.)
What is this book? It has a very meticulous protection magic on it. Not anyone can undo this, but it's easy for me.
(Press on her to undo it immediately.)
Just wait a little! You think protection magic is like a 3-minute mushroom curry? It requires extremely complicated and detailed work!
This defense magic isn't difficult, but it's annoying. It requires many materials. First, I need <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001033$</font>. Get that for me.
$MyPCName$, you don't even know that? <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001033$</font> is obviously in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000090$</font>. Now, hurry along.
(Ask if she can use teleport magic.)
Of course! Isn't that basic for the Ellinel class president?
What's with that look like you don't believe me! Will you believe if I showed you?!
You should be thankful that I'm helping.
Let's see... looks like you brought what I asked. This will be enough.
(Ask if she can decipher the magic now.)
No, this is just one of the materials I need. We still have a long way to go, so stop rushing me.
Do you know that there are two steps to deciphering protection magic?
(Say that you're hearing it for the first time.)

$MyPCName$... I'm really amazed at your knowledge of magic. I'll explain it to you since I'm nice. Listen carefully and memorize. Remember to tell Professor <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000032[gender:0]$</font> how nice I am, got it?
Good. I said earlier that there are two steps to deciphering protection magic. What we prepared is the first step which is the destruction step.
The protection magic is undone and we take out the information within. Now, you can predict what the next step is, right?
Wrong! Don't you know something as simple as this? Think a little harder.
Hey! I just told you that was wrong!
That's right. Since we got the information, we need to change it back to a state we can see. If we can't see it, undoing the seal magic is meaningless.
(Say that you think you know now.)
You understand quickly because the teacher is great! Now, do you know what you need to bring?
Argh! In order for us to see the information, we need <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001034$</font>. It should be in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000019$</font>. Go there.
(Say that you think she will teleport you there if she's nice.)
...Hey, it seems you've been sneaky and using me to your advantage... In return, you must tell Professor <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000032[gender:0]$</font> how much I helped you, okay?
The seal magic can't be undone without <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001034$</font>. Hurry and bring it.
(Hand over the Magic Ink you got.)
Perfect! We need to get only one more thing now.
Now, we need one more to decipher the protection magic.
(Didn't you just say that protection magic is in two steps?)
Huh? N-no! There are 3 steps to deciphering protection magic.
(In order to calm <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11003146[gender:1]$</font>, ask what she needs.)
I need <font color="#ffd200">$item:30000232$</font>. Bring me around 20!
Oh, I heard it's popular these days. I guess you, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11003146[gender:1]$</font>, need it too. But it could be less effective depending on the gender...
I already know about that?! So, are you going to get them or not?
(Say that you'll get them right away!)
I can't help you decipher the protection magic until you bring me <font color="#ffd200">$item:30000232$</font>! Never!
You got them! I'm sure that these...!
...I'm telling this to you but... I want to give these to Professor <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000032[gender:0]$</font>...
Well... he seems low on energy lately... and I want to score some points because Professor <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000032[gender:0]$</font> seems colder after that incident...
I'm not taking about grades... It's you know... something like heart points... Ah! Whatever! Why am I talking about this to you? Hmph!
(Calm $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$ saying that he'll love the gift.)
You think so too? He'll like it, right? It bothered me that his wing was limping when I saw him last time...
...Thanks, $MyPCName$. Let's start undoing that protection magic.
We will play this formula in reverse to neutralize the protection magic, and use <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001033$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001034$</font> that you gathered...
Here! You'll be able to read it now.
(You can really open the book and see the contents inside.)
See? This is the skill of the Ellinel class president! Have a more respectful attitude towards me when we meet again!
(Say that you will return to Sky Fortress.)
Hey, did you listen to what I said? <font size='40'>HEY!</font>
Don't forget to say good things about me to Professor <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000032[gender:0]$</font>!
You're back, $MyPCName$! Did you get the magic on the secret ledger undone?
(Say that it was safely undone and hand over the ledger.)
You're right! Good job. I'll take it from here!
...Hm? What's this? This doesn't even need to be analyzed.
This company... siphoned off munition and dealt in illegal trade! But the client isn't written here... Most of the goods are banned for export.

Spiked armor for shock troops... this is a new item from the Nerman Workshop... Lightweight alloy... this is normally used to improve the carrier but... also used as material for weapons... and there's a large quantity of floating stones.
They could easily form a small scale fleet with this volume being traded.
Hm... but many are missing as I look at the ledger carefully, and it's been happening regularly. I think the losses are being filled because the unit cost is expensive...
Why are things going missing regulary? I'll report this to the captain for now and analyze the cause.
$MyPCName$, thank you for the support! I'll give you the details when the extensive analysis is complete.
$MyPCName$, the aura around you is telling me that you want to help me.
Fine. I will specially give you such an opportunity.
(...Say that you will help for now.)
Just like the captain said, the Lumiknights will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52010053$</font> and check for any singularities in that region.
But many monsters have been detected in that region. Thus, I would like you to take on your duty as the guardian knight. Wipe out the monsters and secure safety of that region.
(Ask why he's not taking the Lumiknights knights there.)
They cannot come and go as they please since their existence is top secret. I'm able to speak with you from the start because the Q class secret has been lifted.
But even though the Q class secret has been lifted, I still feel uncomfortable acting and battling independently. I would like you to join me.
(He looks like a temple knight... ask why he feels uncomfortable with combat.)
My magic sword... Addan Deith. Do you know why it hovers around me?
If I have the sword in my grasp... that day will become the last page of world history.
Addan Deith is a sword of many tears. It's a weak blade that feels for the world...
<font color="#909090">(...You will feel relieved if you just fought instead.)</font>
Your expression looks like you accept. Then, please depart without delay.
Didn't you hear what $npcName:11003536[gender:0]$ just said? Let's wrap things up here.
I knew it but you have good skills. It was worth it to come with you.
Anyways, the reaction of the monsters is negative and hostile than usual even though we appeared here out of the blue. It looks like something is in this region.
It's weak but... feels like a dark energy.
This energy is different from the usual dark energy I felt. It's difficult to detect it if you're not incredibly focused.
I need a catalyst. Please gather suspicious objects that I may get an intense feel of the traces of darkness.
(Say that you should look for it together.)
...Are you sure? If the dark things come close to my body, it will cause a reaction and I might become evil... Would that be fine?
<font color="#909090">(...Let's hurry and find the suspicious object.)</font>
$MyPCName$, you're very quick and already on the move. Then I leave it to you.
Please gather suspicious objects that I may get an intense feel of the traces of darkness.
I get an intense feel of the traces of darkness as you come closer. It seems like you found them.
Then... let me take a look.
(Ask whether he's pushing his body too far by feeling the energy.)
You don't need to worry about my safety. I can do this even for a thousand years if it will make the world better.
(Mason... he means it and isn't showing off by saying that.)
I feel a huge evil energy... I'm at a lost for words to describe it...
I can't believe such a great evil energy exists...
Amazing. It's my first time sensing such a great evil energy.

But... this great evil energy has a different trait from the dark energy that I have felt. This is not a recent occurrence... it feels like a trait from the past when the goddesses of light and darkness existed.
(Ask if he found traces of the goddess of darkness.)
Unfortunately, I don't think it's that. I didn't feel a divine aura from this evil trait.
...This... I will need to report to the captain and the senior command of the knights.
$MyPCName$, thank you for the trouble. Let's return to the carrier.
It seems everyone finished their mission.
Now share the information that everyone obtained.
I now begin the meeting of commanders. Everyone, follow me to the operation center. Including you, $MyPCName$.
Everyone, follow me to the operation center. Including you, $MyPCName$.
First, I thank all of you for making this mission a top priority despite your busy schedule.
I didn't go through any trouble. It was $MyPCName$ who went through all the trouble!
That's right! The analysis of the ledger is almost complete thanks to $MyPCName$.
All these compliments! You sure are worthy of being under me!
I would like to appoint you as an official guardian knight, but I will push that back for later.
Captain, I think something big is going to happen.
That makes the two of us, Mason. I felt uncomfortable when I first received this mission.
We will need to complile the investigatin results from each faction first.
Royal Guard Leader, I ask you for the Tria Guard's investigation result first.
I think it's best to check this image with all of you.
The Tria Guard, well... we didn't go through much. There was an unsettling rumor going around amongst the people and a picture of a black swan with a long neck.
Uh... how does this look like a swan? Do you have farsightedness... from old age? Or did you look at this backwards?
Hmph! You're saying the exact same thing that young guy said! I give up! If I saw this backwards-
This... is not a swan... Wait... I think I saw this before...
What you're thinking about right now isn't too different from what I'm thinking.
The Lumiknights found dark energy at the trading ship crash site. But that trait... was very different from what we usually come into contact with. It was familiar but... strangely different...
I'm also hazy with my memory on that trait. I could remember immediately if I had a critical clue...
Nairin, I then ask you for the Green Hoods' result while those two think.
Yes, captain. The Green Hoods proceeded with the investigation based on the secret ledger given to us by Solvay from the Barrota Trading Company.

$MyPCName$ went through much trouble in the process, but it wasn't a waste. The newly appointed president of the company was trading in illegal weapons. Lightweight alloy, spiked armor for shock troops, large quantity of floating stones, and so forth...

Although we don't know who the clients are, a considerable number of illegal weapons were traded. What's worse is that ledger states several tons went missing. There's a high chance that the missing trading ship was loaded with illegal weapons.
So that's why they were hiding the trade route! No wonder they did a quadruple data partition.
Captain, the trade route of the Barrota trading ship that Dark Wind investigated was very interesting.
4 ships had departure records but no entrance records. Doesn't the number match the destroyed ships and the missing ships?
The interesting thing is that the trade route of all 4 ships passed the floating city of Orbis, and the signal was also lost near Orbis.
Orbis... isn't that the ruined city that got destroyed during the War of Light and Darkness?
Yes, that's correct. But the place is inhabited now, and the central part is still burning making it useless as a temporary base.
In other words, there is zero chance that pirates would have stayed there to plunder.
What if they are not human but things that like fire are living there? What if they were the ones attacking the ships?
Oh, captain, I have an urgent report before that! The black box data has been restored!
Analysis team, transmit the black box data to the operation center.
(Say that it's too blurry to see what it is.)
Screen, sharpen the image and restore the subject's form.
Screen, sharpen the image and restore the subject's form!
That's it! No wonder it looked familiar. What I was trying to remember was them!
This answers the question on the trait I felt. The image makes it clear.
The culprit of the trading ship incident was... Crimson Balrog.
I think we got all the information we need.

$npcName:11003536[gender:0]$, enter the information gathered so far into the MAVIEW radar. Then apply the extensive filtering conditions and scan the entire Maple World. Let's see if it can avoid our eyes this time.
I look forward to the MAVIEW radar's scan result.
Captain, there's tens... no, hundreds of signals detected by the radar.

It's strange that they would launch a large scale attack when they have never done anything to attract attention until now. Since this could be a trap by the enemy, just get rid of them all now that they have been found out by us.
How dare they to my homeland! I'll go there this instant and sweep them away.
Calm down, $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$. All of us will head there.
Everyone heard, right? Full speed to Perion!
I'm saved because all of you came in the nick of time. Thanks.
Let me introduce myself again. I'm <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000144[gender:0]$</font>.
It's been a while, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11003534[gender:0]$</font>. You still have a fiery temperament.

I couldn't believe my eyes when I saw you. Where have you been all this time! Are you trying to make a comeback after hearing I came back as well? You were always like that! Always following behind me...
(Tell him to calm down and listen to what he has to say.)
It looks like everyone has many questions.

I'm the one in charge. The name's <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11003582[gender:0]$</font>. You can call me Captain <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11003582[gender:0]$</font>. You seem like an acquaintance of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11003534[gender:0]$</font>...
He's the former captain, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000144[gender:0]$</font>. He suddenly left the position of captain and disappeared to somewhere. I didn't know I would meet him again here.
I see I'm late with the introduction. I'm <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000144[gender:0]$</font>.
Can you explain who is after Perion and how did you know and come?
They are a gang of the <font color="#ffd200">Crimson Balrog</font>. The minions of Balrog.

By nature, strength has been a top priority for the Balrog species. The name Balrog, representing their species, is given to the strongest among them whom they follow. But that Balrog has been helpless recently...

<font size='30'>But before I continue, I will need to explain why that Balrog is helpless. <font size='10'>Then... well, I will need to explain why I went to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000001$</font> first. All of you must have thought I'm from <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000001$</font> because I was the former captain, but my homeland isn't <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000001$</font>. You might be curious but I'll pass since that information isn't important. Anyways, I went to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000001$</font> for the first time and was amazed. It was a huge city unlike my homeland. I was almost overcome by the big city, but I came to my senses thinking I need to find what I need to do. But what can a rookie that just came from the countryside do? Naturally, nobody wanted to hire me. I was discouraged but a flier blew in front of me. That flier was a <font size='30'>knight recruitment.</font> I thought, 'This is it!' I've been confident of my strength and reflexes ever since I was young. So I took part in the training and went into battles. I started to receive recognition and became the captain which I don't deserve. That is when I met this guy, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11003534[gender:0]$</font>. He's a great comrade in arms. I spent such happy days, but felt that aura on a certain day. That aura was connected to <font size='30'>my family's task</font>.

<font size='30'>There's a task that has been passed down through the generations in my family.<font size='10'> And that is to protect Maple World from Balrog. The story I'm about to tell you was passed down through the generations to my father, to his father, and to his father's father. My family used to defend Maple World in the past with the goddess of light. We spent peaceful days with the goddess of light, but a great evil energy took Maple World by surprise one day. <font size='30'>That was <font color="#ffd200">Infernog</font>. The father of the current <font color="#ffd200">Balrog</font>.</font> The goddess of light and my ancestor were in a fierce battle with <font color="#ffd200">Infernog</font>, but they could not defeat him. The goddess of light thought the best they could do was to seal him. He was sealed in another dimension and the blood he shed during the battle was sealed in the holy mountain of Perion. His son secretly observed the process, absorbed the remnants, and called <font size='30'>himself <font color="#ffd200">Balrog</font>.<font size='10'> Afterwards, <font color="#ffd200">Balrog</font>hid himself and stayed quiet until the goddesses of light and darkness disappeared. After the goddesses were gone, he didn't stop to occupy Maple World. He continued to attack people and destroy cities. Then my ancestors made a decision after seeing those actions.</font>

<font size='30'>That my family will go against Balrog to the end. <font size='10'>Afterwards, whenever <font color="#ffd200">Balrog</font> appeared, my ancestors went to stop him. <font color="#ffd200">Balrog</font> was always stopped by my ancestors because the past memory of seeing <font color="#ffd200">Infernog</font> defeated left a strong impression on him. His ambition to occupy Maple World always failed thanks to that. As this pattern went on for a long time, <font color="#ffd200">Balrog</font> became less active. When I heard this story from my father, I just thought of it as an old story passed down my family. As I was living peacefully as the captain, I suddenly felt <font size='30'>the aura of <font color="#ffd200">Balrog</font> one day.<font size='10'> I hesitated to make a move since I got used to the peaceful life. But the souls of my ancestors whispered to me. <font size='30'>Only you can stop <font color="#ffd200">Balrog</font>.<font size='10'> Afterwards, I stepped down from my position as captain and started the hunt for <font color="#ffd200">Balrog</font>. The memories of my ancestors helped me but it wasn't easy. That is why I asked the adventurers for help. They helped me wholeheartedly. I wasn't able to defeat <font color="#ffd200">Balrog</font> completely, but I was able to interfere with his actions. But as this repeated over and over, the minions of <font color="#ffd200">Balrog</font> no longer regarded him as their leader. As I mentioned earlier, strength is a top priority of the Balrog species.

<font size='30'>That is why they thought they needed to look for a new leader.<font size='10'> The new leader they found was the evil demon, <font color="#ffd200">Infernog</font>, that existed with the goddesses of light and darkness in the past. He is the father of the current <font color="#ffd200">Balrog</font>. A powerful medium is required to bring him back to Maple World as he was sealed by the goddess of light. They have looked for traces of <font color="#ffd200">Infernog</font> for a long time and finally found him. But <font size='30'>I don't know how they found out<font size='10'> the blood of <font color="#ffd200">Infernog</font> was in Perion. They couldn't have felt the aura of <font color="#ffd200">Infernog</font> since it was sealed in the holy mountain of Perion. Anyways, you asked why they are after Perion, right? It's because of the blood of <font size='30'><font color="#ffd200">Infernog</font>.</font>
Insert the conversation just now into the analysis tool and give a brief summary.
...Exceeded available capacity for data analysis... Captain... it can't be analyzed...

<font color="#ffd200">Crimson Balrog</font> betrayed <font color="#ffd200">Balrog</font> because of his repeated failures and pushed ahead with the revival of <font color="#ffd200">Infernog</font> in order to serve a strong leader, and the medium to revive <font color="#ffd200">Infernog</font> is the blood of <font color="#ffd200">Infernog</font> sealed in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000051$</font>, correct?
Yes, that is what I was saying.
It's been a while and I talked a lot.
...I understood the general situation, but I still have one question.
That's right! How did you know and come here?

Welll... it's because of my ill-fated relationship with <font color="#ffd200">Balrog</font>.<font size='10'> Didn't I talk about the story of how my ancestors hunted Balrog? That is when Balrog and my family...
(You look at $npcName:11000401[gender:0]$ asking for his interpretation.)
I think it's best if we all heard it but...
I'll specially help you, $MyPCName$. <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000144[gender:0]$</font>, please continue.

<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000144[gender:0]$</font> can feel Balrog's aura. It must be from the hunting experience passed them from his ancestors. He was looking for any abnormalities with the <font color="#ffd200">Crimson Balrogs</font> and came here after observing a large scale movement.
I was certain something serious is going on after seeing their large scale movement. I could stop them now but... I feel like the threat has already begun.
No matter what threat occurs, all we need to do is stop it. Everyone, make thorough preparations for the upcoming big threat.
<font size='40'>There's nothing that can pierce through the shield of the skies.</font>
$MyPCName$, there's information to be relayed to everyone.
I'll brief on the details in the operation center.
Call each faction officer to come as well...
<font size='40'>(I have a bad feeling about this...)</font>
I apologize for being late, Black Mage. I was carrying out the order from <font color="#ffd200">Madria</font>.
It doesn't matter, Bella. The arrival of <font color="#ffd200">Madrakan</font> is more important than this gathering.
<font size='40'>Grrr...</font> Black Mage... you are negligent in managing your subordinates. How dare they not keep the appointed time of their sovereign's call!
<font size='40'>Are you trying to teach me how to be a sovereign when you were betrayed by your own subordinates?</font>
<font size='40'>Not only is your situation ridiculous, it's pathetic. I can't stand hearing more of it.</font>
No wonder I don't see the <font color="#ffd200">Crimson Balrogs</font>. Seems like you experienced something interesting like betrayal, oh Balrog.
<font size='60'>Why you puny human! You dare make fun of the demon king!</font>
You didn't come all the way here to show off your petty pride, did you?
Or do you want me to finally take away your insignificant life?
Back when you were the Mage of Light and the you now, you're still as arrogant as ever...
It infuriates me but... I didn't come today to fight...
I would like to have a fight right now but... I came all the way to this gloomy place today to make a <font color="#ffd200">deal</font>.
It seems you found a way to wake him up, the great immortal monarch...
I would like to have a fight right now but... I came all the way to this gloomy place today to make a <font color="#ffd200">deal</font>.
A deal? It piques my interest a little.
...Just like you said, <font color="#ffd200">all of my subordinates betrayed me.</font> Both the Crimson Balrogs and the warriors under them.
I'm fully aware that your species follow the way of strength. There's no reason for your subordinates to follow you when you lose to even those insignificant adventurers.
It feels a bit late for them to betray you now. But the Crimson Balrogs don't really have a <font color="#ffd200">great demon to server</font>.
<font size='40'>HAHAHAHA...! This will be easy to explain since you remember!</font>
<font size='40'>It's <font color="#ffd200">Infernog</font>, an ancient Balrog who is also my father.</font>
Far from it! If <font color="#ffd200">Infernog</font> revived, there's no way Maple World would be at peace like this.
...And I wouldn't be here at all.
But he's close to <font color="#ffd200">reviving</font>. Didn't you see the signs?
Black Mage... I did witness the Crimson Balrogs in the skies frequently. It doesn't look like they are simply expanding their territory.
It seems they found a way to wake him. <font color="#ffd200">That great immortal monarch</font>.
There's a <font color="#ffd200">huge carrier</font> in the skies... and now a new disaster is trying to revive!
Your plan, do you think it's feasible in this situation? That stopping the <font color="#ffd200">destruction from light</font> or whatever it was.
Oh Balrog, you seem very confident in this situation. Didn't you come here because you have a solution?
Black Mage, I have a plan to get rid of these two variables at once.
<font size='40'>A plan to <font color="#ffd200">destroy that despicable ship</font> and <font color="#ffd200">stop my father's revival</font>.</font>
I'm the only one that knows the whereabouts of <font color="#ffd200">that thing</font> needed to revive Infernog.
My subordinates are relying on <font color="#ffd200">rumors of that thing's whereabouts</font> prying here and there.
If we can utilize that rumor... we can move the Crimson Balrogs however we want. <font color="#ffd200">Such as creating an intentional encounter with the aircraft carrier...</font>
Hm, it's just a matter of time until Sky Fortress is destroyed when you think of the strength and overwhelming troops of the Crimson Balrogs.

And when they're busy fighting and tire out... I will appear at that moment and destroy both sides! <font color="#ffd200">Both the annoying aircraft carrier and the traitorous group will vanish!</font>
<font size='40'>You will have two variables removed and I will become the king of my species once more with this deal. Aren't these good conditions?</font>
Hahaha! Think carefully, Black Mage. If Infernog revives, he will attack Maple World like before... <font color="#ffd200">Then do you think Ereve will be safe?</font>
If Infernog hurts Ereve... none of us will be safe...
<font size='40'><font color="#ffd200">From the destruction from light, that is.</font></font>
<font size='40'>Did you come here calling that a deal?</font>
<font color="#ffd200">The great immortal monarch</font>? You bring something that only applies to your kind and trying to make a deal with me?
If Infernog dabbles in my plan even a little, your species will disappear at that moment.
<font size='40'>The reason any of you are still alive is because I wasn't interested.</font>
But it seems you're begging me to take interest... Then I should exterminate you as you wish.
Grrr... I can't believe I have to do this...
If you stop my father's revival... I will give you my Lapenta Shard...
The Lapenta given to divine creatures... although this is a fragment of it, I know it will be tempting to you...
...I'm saying this just in case, but I'm the only one that knows the whereabouts of my Lapenta! Don't even think of killing me for it!
Hehehe... Balrog... I never imagined to see you begging for your life... This is very interesting...
Find the things that chipmunk hid. Seems like he hid them well to extend his insignificant life, hehehe...
Oh Balrog, I'm jealous that the Black Mage adores you, hehehe...
(Jerks... once I recover my power... I'll get rid of you... grr...)
<font size='40'>Black Mage, should I bring <font color="#ffd200">Turka</font>?</font>
<font color="#ffd200">Corrupting Katvan was not part of the plan.</font> The aftereffect was that Sky Fortress fell into their hands.
Bella, I'll leave you to Balrog for a while. You will carry out his plan.
<font size='35'>It will be fun to get rid of Sky Fortress as well. Make them long for the skies.</font>
<font size='35'>Yes, Black Mage. I follow your command.</font>
